Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal.`` Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. Clarence Mitchell , a former BBC News presenter, is a member of the Conservative Party in north London and also An emergency debate has been called to examine newspaper phone hacking, amid fresh pressure on No10 communications chief Andy Coulson

'' Dwaine Caraway said. It came up that Kiss lead singer Gene Simmons got a key to the city last week for supporting the troops. Dwaine Caraway said that supports him giving a key to Michael Vick . He is supporting the troops, I am supporting the children, he said. Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick the key during an event at Club Cirque that was attended by children who came to hear Michael Vick 's story. Dwaine Caraway said he would do it all over again
